---code---
//uva10221
#include <iostream>
#include <iomanip>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;
#define PI acos(0.0)*2.0
 
int main() {
    double r, s, a;
    string unit;
    double chord, arc;
    r = 6440.0;
    while (cin >> s >> a >> unit){
        if (unit == "min") a /= 60.0;
        if (a > 180.0) a = 360.0 - a;
        chord = (r+s) * cos((90.0 - a/2.0)/ 180.0 * PI) * 2.0;
        arc = 2.0 * PI * (r+s) * a / 360.0;
        cout << fixed << setprecision(6) << arc << " " << chord << "\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
---dataAInput---
500 30 deg
700 60 min 
200 45 deg
500 1800 min
700 1 deg
200 2700 min
100 0 deg
100 0 min
1000 1 deg
1000 60 min
2393 28 min
300 25 deg
600 180 deg
6440 140 deg
3023 157 deg
8023 55 min
